sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' import { IconButton, useDisclosure, Image, Text } from '@chakra-ui/react' import { ViewIcon } from '@chakra-ui/icons'; import { Modal, ModalOverlay, ModalContent, ModalHeader, ModalFooter, ModalBody, ModalCloseButton, Button } from '@chakra-ui/react' const ProfileModal = ({ user, children }) => { const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure(); return ( <> {children ? ( {children} ) : ( } onClick={onOpen} /> )} {user.name} Email: {user.email} ) } export default ProfileModal
